title: Step 52

challengeFiles.name: index
styles

tests.text: Your .cat-nose selector should have a border-left property set to 15px solid transparent.
Your .cat-nose selector should have a border-right property set to 15px solid transparent.
Your .cat-nose selector should have a border-bottom property set to 20px solid #442c2c.

description: Using a class selector, give your .cat-nose element a left and right border of 15px solid transparent each. Also give it a bottom border of 20px solid #442c2c.
